tasks.description: Brainstorm ideas for capstone until an idea is approved by the instructors.
Plan the project out a bit mentally and on paper.
Write user stories and submit them for approval.
Update user stories and work with instructors to finalize them.
Create the project repository.
Choose license (UNLICENSE) and write up a basic README.
Create a wireframe.
Set up client with create-react-app and install needed dependencies.
Create a favicon and add it to the client.
Set up server and connect it to MongoDB Atlas.
Create Mongoose models and Express middleware and routes.
Create this timeline.
Create Trello board and add tasks to it.
Update Mongoose models.

timeline.days: Saturday, November 7 && Sunday, November 8 && Monday, November 9

tasks.description: Add mandatory routes except goal routes (and helper functions) to the server.
Add goal routes to the server.
Set up Redux in the client.
Get user account creation working in the client.
Get user log-in working in the client.
Get user log-out working in the client.
Create user's home page for after sign-in and populate it with helpful information/buttons.
Add instructional material about budgeting/money management.
Build components to hold coming features such as goals and budgets.
Let user create a budget.
Let user add recurring income to a budget.
Let user add single-occurrence income to a budget.
Let user add recurring outgo to a budget.
Let user add single-occurrence outgo to a budget.
Let user view income and outgo added to a budget.
Let user remove income and outgo entries from a budget.
Let user modify income and outgo entries in a budget.
Show user upcoming outgo reminders.
Let user set and view financial/general goals and optionally include an estimated completion date.
Let user mark financial/general goals as complete and manually modify the completion date if so desired.
Let user undo marking financial/general goals as complete.
Let user set and view financial/general goals and optionally include an estimated completion date.
Let user mark financial/general goals as complete and manually modify the completion date if so desired.
Let user undo marking financial/general goals as complete.
Let user view all income and outgo between a start and end date.
Let user see a simulation of the number of dollars left on an end date (considering planned income and outgo between now and then) given a start date and a start amount.
Let user view a breakdown of outgo by category.
Add suggested budget categories so the user can start a budget without having to manually type category names.
Allow user to add other budget managers or budget viewers to a budget.
Cause budgets to not allow editing if the user is only a viewer (not manager) of a budget.
Allow a budget viewer to submit a request for modification of a budget.
Allow a budget manager to view budget modification requests.
Allow a budget manager to delete budget modification requests.
Set up recording of previous changes to a budget
Allow budget managers to view the list of previous changes to a budget
Complete unfinished tasks if there are any.
Deploy to an AWS hosted domain.
Test the application with others.
Continue testing with others.
Complete project by this day.
